fields.name: SwapFileSizeMB
fields.description: The size in MB of a swap file that will be created on each node.

fields.name: Sysctls
fields.description: Sysctl settings for Linux agent nodes.

fields.name: TransparentHugePageDefrag
fields.description: Valid values are 'always', 'defer', 'defer+madvise', 'madvise' and 'never'. The default is 'madvise'. For more information see [Transparent Hugepages](https://www.kernel.org/doc/html/latest/admin-guide/mm/transhuge.html#admin-guide-transhuge).

fields.name: TransparentHugePageEnabled
fields.description: Valid values are 'always', 'madvise', and 'never'. The default is 'always'. For more information see [Transparent Hugepages](https://www.kernel.org/doc/html/latest/admin-guide/mm/transhuge.html#admin-guide-transhuge).
